articles.author: Joshua Posaner
articles.title: Swiss prosecutors open probe into UBS takeover of Credit Suisse - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The two banks agreed to merge last month in an emergency deal aimed at avoiding a national financial crisis.
articles.content:
Swiss prosecutors have opened an investigation into possible illegal activity in connection with government support for UBSs rushed takeover of Credit Suisse.

articles.author: Latha Venkatesh
articles.title: India emerging as a services export giant - not just software! - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India with its waves of engineering and accountancy graduates each year may be able to provide these services to ageing US and European countries for the foreseeable future.
articles.content: India's April-February goods exports are up just 7.5 percent while exports in February alone are down 9 percent (YoY). But Indias services exports are up 30 percent for April- February and up a whopp… [+5858 chars]
